headline: A Look At FirstEnergy (FE) Valuation As Recent Performance Draws Fresh Investor Attention
summary: Why FirstEnergy Stock Is Back on Investor Radars With no single headline event driving FirstEnergy (FE) into the spotlight, investors are instead looking at its recent share performance and fundamentals to reassess how the regulated utility fits into their portfolios. See our latest analysis for FirstEnergy. After a recent 1-day share price decline of 1.04% and a 7-day share price decline of 1.65%, FirstEnergy’s 30-day share price return of 3.81% and 1-year total shareholder return of 18.67%...
